attributes.action: Allow UK Citizens to fight with Ukrainians against Putin
attributes.background: Provide clarity on current guidelines. Specifically allow UK Citizens to travel to Eastern Europe and fight with Ukraine against Putin’s military forces.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want UK citizens to be able to travel to Ukraine to take part in the conflict there, but we're not sure what you want the Government to do.

The Government is currently advising against all travel to Ukraine, but it is up to individuals whether to travel to Ukraine, and for what purpose. If there is a particular policy or piece of guidance you think is preventing this you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
